experience.name: Politics of the United States of America

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What are some examples of systemic racism?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

credentials.translatedString: M.A Sociology & International Relations, University of Edinburgh (1998)

"Gay couples in the United States, by race/ethnicity 2018 | Statista", "index": 1, "unique_id": "NlMBv"}}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "is, an often ignored example of Systemic racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-043a13878fa1541a78ff0ff3ef784471", "height": 568, "width": 810, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-66ecf7589bb76d3a920c17e12f478bcf", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "This bar-chart presents a demographics of gay men in USA.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "73% of US men are white. 82% of self-reported gay men are white", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "5% of US men are Asian, 4.1% of self-reported gay men are asian", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "13% of US men are ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "black", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": ", while ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "only ", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": "5.9% of self-reported gay men are black", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The discrepancy can ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "not ", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": "be ignored.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "There\u2019s no biological theory that suggests black men are less likely to be gay. It is only natural that at least 10\u201312% of all gay men would be, ethnically black (given the fact US has 13% black population). But the statistics do ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "not ", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": "match that expectation.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Why?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The reason is purely social. Black men are less likely to come out. Black gay men are less likely to accept themselves.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "As a broader community, African-americans enjoy less exposure and less opportunities towards societal liberation and enlightenment. There\u2019s a reason \u2014 why DL culture", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"citation": {"target": {"type": "url", "url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Down-low_(sexual_slang)"}, "title": "Down-low (sexual slang) - Wikipedia", "index": 2, "unique_id": "TGljH"}}}, {"text": " is prevalent in the African-American communities.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "This \u2018lack of liberation/enlightenment\u2019 on a broader \u2018community-level\u2019, due to societal factors perpetuate into sexual practices and access to relevant healthcare. It imposes additional dangers to men of color. That is precisely why, despite being a statistical minority, African americans are significantly more affected by HIV. Statistically, black men are more than 10 times more likely", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"citation": {"target": {"type": "url", "url": "https://www.kff.org/hivaids/fact-sheet/black-americans-and-hivaids-the-basics/"}, "title": "Black Americans and HIV/AIDS: The Basics", "index": 3, "unique_id": "iWPwl"}}}, {"text": " to be infected by HIV.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-5838062a4914d6d00ee391e3b8085026", "height": 1800, "width": 3209, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-c7816c29fcfb37ba2447d4b6ba5e6611", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Moral of the story \u2014 Systemic racism exists, and it hurts in more ways than we can imagine.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
